subtitle: A complete meal of chicken, potatoes and vegetables cooked in a creamy white sauce.

method.text: Heat the butter and oil together until melted. Add the onion and garlic and fry for 2 min until softened. Add the chicken to the pan and fry for 5 min until lightly browned then set aside.
Melt the butter in a saucepan. Add the flour and cook for 1 min. Gradually stir in the milk until all is incorporated.
Bring to the boil and simmer until thickened slightly. Remove from heat. Stir in the cream, lemon juice, seasoning and tarragon.
Stir the chicken mixture into the sauce with the broccoli. Spoon half into an ovenproof dish.
Arrange half the sliced potatoes over the chicken mixture. Repeat the layers ending with a potato layer.
Dot the remaining butter over the dish. Cook in the oven for 30-40 min until hot and golden brown.

title: Chicken dauphinois
